page.title: 06Wortley Top Forge
page.content: Wortley Forge was built in 1621 Wortley Forge was used to make canon balls and metal rods that were made into nails.They also made railway axles for all the new steam-trains being built.The forge also made iron bars to send to other mills on the river.Some made them into wire,some into shovels e.t.c.We saw a big water wheel made out of iron.There were three other water wheels.Two made the hammers go and one made the bellows go.The Forge doesn,t make anything now but you can go and look round.In the museum there was a model of the forge of what it looked like in the olden days.In a museum there are some old things that they used to use like an iron,horse shoe,key,box and a nail.Wortley Forge has a steam-weekend about twice a year.
